Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that are eventually followed by Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE in variants that contain Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that lead to a successful Payment Handled without any intermediate rejection
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE in the most common variant (Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE → Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION → Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR → Request Payment → Payment Handled)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that are followed by Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER instead of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that occur in cases with total Amount above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that are resubmitted after a rejection by any role (including Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that are directly followed by Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER and then rejected
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Ratio of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE leading to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER versus those leading to Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE in variants where PRE_APPROVER is involved but does not reject the declaration
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that bypass the PRE_APPROVER role entirely (i.e., go directly to ADMINISTRATION or SUPERVISOR)
Metric: Number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' occurs

Name: Percentage of all Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER that originate from a Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE within the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE in variants containing loops due to repeated rejections by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that result in a completed process (ending in Payment Handled) within variants involving PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE grouped by case:BudgetNumber to identify budget-related patterns preceding rejections by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' activities grouped by the last value of case:DeclarationNumber filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
